attributes.action: posthumously pardon Steve Thoburn, unjustly convicted for using imperial and metric together.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The recent climbdown over forced metrication in the UK makes the persecution and conviction of Steve Thoburn, simply for giving his customers the choice of buying fruit by the pound or the kilo, even more unjust than before. 

This petition acknowledges that Steve, rightly dubbed a "metric martyr," died an innocent man, having committed no real "crime" at all. 

We call for this to be formally acknowledged by posthumous pardon.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
